node.name: /Call_Content_Codec_Offer_Interface_RTCP_Extended_Reports

tp:docstring.p: This codec offer interface provides a method of signalling for RTCP extended reports, documented by RTP Control Protocol Extended Reports (RTCP XR) (RFC 3611).
For more details on what RTCP extended reports can do and how to use them, one should refer to RFC 3611.

tp:struct.name: RTCP_XR_Parameters_And_Values
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A list of RTCP extended report parameters and their values.

tp:member.name: Parameters
tp:member.tp:docstring: The extended report parameters to set.

tp:member.name: Loss_RLE_Max_Size
tp:member.tp:docstring: If the RTCP_XR_Parameters_Loss_RLE flag is set on Parameters, then this member is used to specify the largest size the whole report block SHOULD have. 0 is used to not specify a max size.

tp:member.name: Duplicate_RLE_Max_Size
tp:member.tp:docstring: If the RTCP_XR_Parameters_Duplicate_RLE flag is set on Parameters, then this member is used to specify the largest size the whole report block SHOULD have. 0 is used to not specify a max size.

tp:member.name: Packet_Receipt_Times_Max_Size
tp:member.tp:docstring: If the RTCP_XR_Parameters_Packet_Receipt_Times flag is set on Parameters, then this member is used to specify the largest size the whole report block SHOULD have. 0 is used to not specify a max size.

tp:member.name: RTT_Max_Size
tp:member.tp:docstring: If the RTCP_XR_Parameters_RTT flag is set on Parameters, then this member is used to specify the largest size any DLRR report block sent SHOULD have. 0 is used to not specify a max size.

tp:member.name: RTT_Mode
tp:member.tp:docstring: If the RTCP_XR_Parameters_RTT flag is set on Parameters, then this member specifies a RTT mode value.

tp:member.name: Statistics_Flags
tp:member.tp:docstring: If the RTCP_XR_Parameters_Statistics_Summary flag is set on Parameters, then this member specifies the fields which SHOULD be included in the statistics summary report blocks that are sent. There can be one or more flags set.

property.name: XRParameters
property.tp:docstring: A list of remote report parameters which are supported.

tp:enumvalue.tp:docstring: Both RTP data senders and data receivers MAY send DLRR blocks.
Only active RTP senders MAY send DLRR blocks, i.e., non RTP senders SHALL NOT send DLRR blocks.
